alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 12:02AM CDT until April 19 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL DODGE AND CENTRAL SAUNDERS COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Colon, or 7 miles southwest of Fremont, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...0.8" hail was reported by a trained spotter in Wahoo at 12:00AM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wahoo, Cedar Bluffs, Valparaiso, Weston, Prague, Malmo, Leshara, Colon, Woodcliff, Lake Wanahoo Recreation Area, Ames, Camp Eagle, Camp Cedars and Czechland Lake. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
